thread.title: Indian Muslim Leaders Use Fatwa to Condemn Islamic State
thread.title_full: Indian Muslim Leaders Use Fatwa to Condemn Islamic State - WSJ

author: Niharika Mandhana
title: Indian Muslim Leaders Use Fatwa to Condemn Islamic State
text:
NEW DELHI—More than 1,000 Indian Muslim scholars and religious leaders have jointly condemned Islamic State in an effort to counter the militant group’s drive to recruit young men and women in a country that is home to the world’s second-largest Muslim population.
India’s Home Ministry says it knows of 17 Indians who have joined Islamic State, a strikingly low figure compared with the hundreds of Muslims from Europe and Australia who... To Read the Full Story, Subscribe or Sign In
